toolSpec.name: extract_youtube_metadata
toolSpec.description: Extracts structured YouTube metadata from documents with multilingual support

localizations.description: Multilingual metadata for the video. Each language must have title and description in that specific language.

pt.description: Portuguese (Brazilian) metadata - título e descrição devem estar em português brasileiro

title.description: Video title in Portuguese (max 60 characters, must be in Portuguese)

description.description: Video description in Portuguese (150-2000 characters, must be in Portuguese)

en.description: English metadata - title and description must be in English

title.description: Video title in English (max 60 characters, must be in English)

description.description: Video description in English (150-2000 characters, must be in English)

es.description: Spanish metadata - título y descripción deben estar en español

title.description: Video title in Spanish (max 60 characters, must be in Spanish)

description.description: Video description in Spanish (150-2000 characters, must be in Spanish)

tags.description: 3-10 relevant tags for the video in English (single words or short phrases, relevant to video content)
